headline: Dow Jones Futures Fall With Trump Fed Pick Due; Apple Rises, Tesla Pops, Sandisk Soars
summary: Software stocks dived Thursday but the key indexes rallied back above key levels, with Google and Nvidia in buy areas. Apple and Sandisk rose late on earnings.

content.title: Dow Jones Futures Fall With Trump Fed Pick Due; Apple Rises, Tesla Pops, Sandisk Soars
content.summary: Software stocks dived Thursday but the key indexes rallied back above key levels, with Google and Nvidia in buy areas. Apple and Sandisk rose late on earnings.

headline: Apple earnings soar as China iPhone sales surge
summary: Apple on Thursday said it saw record-high earnings in the final three months of last year, with iPhone sales surging in greater China.Sales of iPhones grew around the world, climbing to $25.5 billion in the crucial Greater China market as compared to $18.5 billion during the same period a year earlier, according to Apple.

content.title: Apple earnings soar as China iPhone sales surge
content.summary: Apple on Thursday said it saw record-high earnings in the final three months of last year, with iPhone sales surging in greater China.Sales of iPhones grew around the world, climbing to $25.5 billion in the crucial Greater China market as compared to $18.5 billion during the same period a year earlier, according to Apple.

thumbnail.caption: Apple's record-breaking quarterly earnings release comes amid speculation regarding chief executive Tim Cook's retirement from the iPhone maker (Fabrice COFFRINI)

headline: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev Downplays AI Job Fears, Saying 'AI Will Lead To An Explosion Of New Jobs' While Warning Change 'Makes Us Very Nervous'
summary: Artificial intelligence is accelerating changes to how work gets done, raising questions about whether technology replaces jobs or reshapes them. AI is more likely to change how work is structured than eliminate jobs altogether, Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) CEO Vlad Tenev recently told Fox Business. He said past technological shifts show that new tools have repeatedly reshaped labor rather than removed it, even as uncertainty often accompanies periods of transition. Don't Miss: The AI Ma

headline: Mark Zuckerberg Says Video Not 'End Of The Line' As Meta Eyes Future Where Users Can Jump Inside The Content: 'The Investments That We've Done...'
summary: On Wednesday, Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ:META) CEO Mark Zuckerberg said the company is looking beyond video toward interactive, immersive formats that let users step inside content, as Horizon Worlds and AI converge to reach mobile audiences. headline: Meta's AI 2026 CapEx Can Pay For 90 NFL Stadiums, 10 James Webb Telescopes And Rivals New York's Budget As Zuckerberg Bets Big On 'Superintelligence'
summary: Meta Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ:META) is doubling down on AI with its most ambitious capital spending plan to date, outlining record infrastructure investments for fiscal 2026. Zuckerberg Bets Big On ‘Superintelligence’ During the company’s fourth-quarter earnings call on Wednesday, the company’s CFO, Susan Li, said that she anticipates 2026 capital expenditures “to be in the range of $115 to $135 billion,” with much of it aimed at supporting “Meta Superintelligence Labs efforts.” Meta’s CEO Mark Zu

headline: Cloud AI Today - AI Growth Fueled By Cloud Innovation and Demand
summary: The Cloud AI market, specifically within the domain of Artificial Intelligence as a Service (AIaaS), is experiencing robust expansion driven by advancements in cloud infrastructure and the demand for scalable, cost-effective solutions. As organizations increasingly shift to cloud-based AI frameworks, which allow for the outsourcing of AI capabilities without major capital expenditures, there is notable growth driven by the need for quick digital transformation and democratized technology...

content.title: Cloud AI Today - AI Growth Fueled By Cloud Innovation and Demand

As organizations increasingly shift to cloud-based AI frameworks, which allow for the outsourcing of AI capabilities without major capital expenditures, there is notable growth driven by the need for quick digital transformation and democratized technology...
